snippet.title: Ari In Wonderland: monArchy Episode 1 full playthrough
snippet.description:
Download here (free) : https://blacksabbathtwn.itch.io/ari-in-wonderland-monarchy

Ari after a long day falls fast asleep and goes back into wonderland. She has no idea why she is back. A lot has changed and the more she thinks about her past it gets more and more blurry.  Ari  meets some friends on the way to help her find what she wants and to restore wonderland, discover Ari's past along with her.



UPDATE 1.1.8

- Dialogue change

- Changed spelling errors

- Menu music

- Explained battle mechanics easier

- Fixed Slater glitch





UPDATE 1.1.5

- New character models

- Fixed Slater glitch

UPDATE 1.05

- UI fix

- Font change
